detail_desc: Shirt in airy cotton with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Ankle-length trousers in stretch twill containing some lyocell. Regular waist, a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets, flap leg pockets and fake back pockets with a flap. Slim legs with seams at the knees.
Bomber jacket in a nylon weave with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Zipped side pockets, a double pocket on one sleeve, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Jersey lining.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
High-waisted shorts in jacquard-weave viscose with a sheen. Waistband with wrapover ties, zip fly and side pockets.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. High waist with wide, elasticated ribbing. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
T-shirt in airy linen jersey with a round neckline and straight-cut hem.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Metal earrings in various geometric shapes with marbled, stone-like details in plastic. The zinc content of the earrings is recycled.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Straight-cut top in softly draping stretch jersey with a metallic-coloured coating. Draped polo neck with an opening at the back that can be fastened with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, and extra-long sleeves. Concealed zip at the back and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. The cotton content of the socks is organic.
Short dress in soft, patterned viscose jersey with narrow shoulder straps and decorative crossover straps at the back. Unlined.
Set with a dress and leggings in soft organic cotton jersey. Dress with long sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist. Leggings with an elasticated waist.

Long dress in woven fabric in a narrow cut at the top with an opening at the front and short, narrow shoulder straps. Narrow elasticated seam with a drawstring at the waist and a straight-cut, softly draping skirt. Satin-lined bodice.
Blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Polo-neck jumper in a soft, rib-knit cashmere blend in a relaxed, straight fit with long sleeves.
Jumpsuit in an airy, patterned weave with short butterfly sleeves and press-studs on one shoulder. Elasticated seam with a decorative bow at the waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.
Slippers with a concealed elastic trim around the top. Terry linings and insoles and soft imitation suede soles.
Pointelle vest tops in soft cotton jersey with a scalloped trim around the neckline and armholes, and a small satin bow at the front.
Cotton twill shorts in a relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.
Sandals with straps with hook and loop fasteners over the feet and a loop at the back. Patterned rubber insoles and rubber soles.
Short-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a motif.

Set with mittens and a hat in an organic cotton rib knit. Mittens with foldover ribbing at the top. Sizes 0-6M without thumbs. Hat with a pompom on top and ear flaps with ties under the chin. Jersey lining.

Calf-length dress in an airy Tencel™ lyocell and viscose weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with a slit and covered buttons at the cuffs, and a curved hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Patterned bikini. Lined top with adjustable shoulder straps and two flounces. Lined bottoms.

Denim shorts with a regular waist and button fly. Side pockets, a coin pocket with a button and three back pockets, one of which is a welt pocket with a button. Straight legs with shaping seams that have longer hems at the front. Straight fit.
Cap in a cotton weave with an embroidered appliqué at the front. Unlined.
Top in viscose crêpe jersey with a slightly wider neckline, short, flounced sleeves and short slits in the sides.

Jumpsuit in a soft, patterned viscose weave with short dolman sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a decorative bow. Concealed press-at the back, an elasticated seam and decorative bow with tassels at the waist, side pockets and wide, ankle-length legs.
Shirt dress in soft, checked cotton twill with a lightly brushed finish. Collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with a tab and button, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Short top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline, short sleeves and a seam at the hem with a decorative knot detail at the front.

Short-sleeved romper suit in striped, slub-weave cotton with buttons down the front, an elasticated seam at the waist, patch pockets at the sides and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Opening with press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (not in sizes 1-4Y).
Top in soft cotton jersey with dropped shoulders and short sleeves trimmed with a wide woven and broderie anglaise flounce.
Short satin dressing gown with a lace yoke and short, wide sleeves with lace trims. Concealed ties and a detachable tie belt at the waist.

Running tights in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Zipped key pocket at one hip, reflective details, and legs with ventilating mesh sections at the back of the knees and a zip at the hems.
Short-sleeved sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric with a small reflective detail at the hem.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a fold-down shaft and soft terry inside. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with a lace yoke and shoulders, a tie at the back of the neck and cap sleeves. Gathers at the sides for best fit. Unlined.

Straight-style, V-neck blouse in a gently crêped cotton weave with an elasticated neckline and small stand-up collar. Decorative drawstring with twisted cords and tassels, and long raglan sleeves with embroidery and elasticated cuffs.

Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with an integral sports bra and racer back. Sports bra with a double layer of fabric at the front, elasticated hem and opening at the back with crossover straps.
Trousers in a patterned viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist in a relaxed fit. Side pockets, a slightly lower crotch, tapered legs and elasticated hems.
Wide jumper in a soft rib knit with sequined embroidery on the front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Slightly longer at the back.
Fitted sports vest top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and twisted seams. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
Short shorts in a crêpe weave. Concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly and drawstrings down the sides that tie at the hems.
Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a boat neck, 3/4-length sleeves with a slit and button at the cuffs, and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, printed jersey with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front, seam with narrow elastication at the waist and a detachable tie belt. Unlined.
Nursing top in patterned viscose jersey with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the top, seam under the bust and short, flounced sleeves. Practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Long-sleeved, all-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Ankle-length suit trousers in a crêpe weave. High waist with pleats, a zip fly and button, pockets in the side seams and fake welt back pockets. Gently tapered legs with creases.
Shopper in cotton canvas with fringing down the short sides, two rope handles at the top with metal ends, and an imitation leather base. Unlined.

Short kaftan dress woven in a Tencel™ lyocell blend containing some linen. Double stand-up collar with a V-shaped opening and drawstrings at the front and long, wide raglan sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Asymmetric seam at the waist with covered elastication at the back and drawstrings at the front. Lined in a cotton weave.
Scarf in woven fabric with fringes on the short sides.
NICK VEASEY x H&M. T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with an embroidered pattern on the front and down the sleeves, and a ribbed trim around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Knitted hat with earflaps and ties under the chin. Jersey lining.
Narrow belt in braided imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width approx. 1.5 cm.
Bodysuit in soft, patterned cotton jersey with long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.

prod_name: TP ALBIN basic rib l/s 2p SB
detail_desc: Long-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton and linen blend with a turn-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved dress in soft, double-weave organic cotton with buttons down the front, a seam at the hips and a gathered skirt. Lined at the top.
Fabric-covered Alice band decorated with pearly plastic beads and sparkly glass beads.

Knee-length shorts in soft, stretch cotton denim with a fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs with raw-edge hems. Wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.

Short dress in a linen and viscose weave with decorative lace trims. V-neck, a concealed zip at the back and long, wide raglan sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined.
Knee-length shorts in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, slightly lower crotch, side pockets and a back pocket.
Jacquard-knit socks in various colours and designs.
Top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip at the top. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Premium cotton shirt with a turn-down collar, French front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Rain jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed, waterproof seams and a detachable, pile-lined hood with a peak. Zip down the front, elasticated cuffs and a fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front. The cotton content of the boxer shorts is organic.
Trousers in soft velvet with a high waist, concealed zip in one side, side pockets and wide legs.
Cardigan in a soft, fine, hole-patterned knit with long, wide dolman sleeves and a rounded hem. No buttons.

Calf-length dress in a crêpe weave with short, elasticated, frill-trimmed sleeves and flounces down the front. Opening with buttons at the back, a smocked seam at the waist and slit at the front. Unlined. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Short dress in a soft, fine knit with a ribbed turtle neck, long sleeves and a flared skirt.
Joggers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and elasticated hems. Slim Fit.
Top in an airy, crêpe weave with a V-neck front and back, a horizontal tie at the back of the neck and long sleeves with a seam and wide double flounce.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend containing glittery threads with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. No buttons.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend containing glittery threads. Dropped shoulders with a flounced trim and long sleeves. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Long-sleeved jersey top.
